Name: Beholder's Revenge VI
Desc:
The Beholder counterattacks the enemy. The Beholder deals damage to enemies directly attacked by the Dark Knight.
After a certain number of Beholder attacks, a Revenge Stigma is placed on the target, and when all the Revenge Stigmas are placed, Beholder's Revenge is activated.
The Beholder's attacks do not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.
Required Skill: Beholder's Revenge Lv. 30 or higher

HFields.h1:
The Dark Knight's direct Attack skill hits have a 60% chance of attacking up to 10 enemies at 148% Damage 5 times. 2 hits place a Revenge Stigma.
If x3 Revenge Stigmas are reached, consumes all of them and activates Beholder Punishment.
Beholder Punishment: Attacks at 223% Damage 5 times.
